title: How to Find Out Why You Were Suspended on Xbox Live

steps.headline: Error messages.
steps.description:
If your account has been suspended, you may see one of these messages when you sign in to Xbox Live:
"Your account has been suspended due to a problem with your payment option." "This console has been banned for violations of the Terms of Use."

steps.headline: Verify that the credit card you use for your Xbox account is valid and up-to-date.
steps.description: Your account might have been suspended because of an outstanding balance.

steps.headline: Call Xbox Customer Support for an explanation of your suspension and how to get it lifted.
Check your inbox for an email from Xbox regarding your suspension.
Visit the Xbox support forums.
steps.description: In the "My LIVE account was suspended" section you can describe your issue and receive a response from an Xbox representative.

text:
Error messages. If your account has been suspended, you may see one of these messages when you sign in to Xbox Live:
"Your account has been suspended due to a problem with your payment option." "This console has been banned for violations of the Terms of Use." Verify that the credit card you use for your Xbox account is valid and up-to-date. Your account might have been suspended because of an outstanding balance. Call Xbox Customer Support for an explanation of your suspension and how to get it lifted.  Check your inbox for an email from Xbox regarding your suspension.  Visit the Xbox support forums. In the "My LIVE account was suspended" section you can describe your issue and receive a response from an Xbox representative.
